00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_CHARSTR_HASHMAP_H
00021 #define HYPERTABLE_CHARSTR_HASHMAP_H
00022 
00023 #include "HashMap.h"
00024 #include "CstrHashTraits.h"
00025 
00026 namespace Hypertable {
00027 
00031 template <typename DataT, class TraitsT = CstrHashTraits>
00032 class CstrHashMap : public hash_map<const char *, DataT,
00033                                        typename TraitsT::hasher,
00034                                        typename TraitsT::key_equal> {
00035 private:
00036   typedef hash_map<const char *, DataT, typename TraitsT::hasher,
00037                    typename TraitsT::key_equal> Base;
00038 public:
00039   typedef typename Base::iterator iterator;
00040   typedef typename Base::key_type key_type;
00041   typedef typename Base::value_type value_type;
00042   typedef typename TraitsT::key_allocator key_allocator;
00043   typedef std::pair<iterator, bool> InsRet;
00044 
00045 private:
00046   key_allocator m_alloc;
00047 
00048 private:
00049   InsRet
00050   insert_key(const char *key, InsRet rv) {
00051     if (rv.second) {
00052       char *keycopy = m_alloc.dup(key);
00053       const_cast<key_type &>(rv.first->first) = keycopy;
00054     }
00055     return rv;
00056   }
00057 
00058 public:
00059   CstrHashMap() {}
00060   CstrHashMap(size_t n_buckets) : Base(n_buckets) {}
00061   ~CstrHashMap() {}
00062 
00063   // hides all insert methods in base class
00064   InsRet
00065   insert(const char *key, const DataT &data) {
00066     return insert_key(key, Base::insert(value_type(key, data)));
00067   }
00068 
00069   InsRet
00070   insert_noresize(const char *key, const DataT &data) {
00071     return insert_key(key, Base::insert_noresize(value_type(key, data)));
00072   }
00073 
00074   DataT&
00075   operator[](const char *key) {
00076     return insert(key, DataT()).first->second;
00077   }
00078 
00079   key_allocator &
00080   key_alloc() { return m_alloc; }
00081 
00082   void
00083   clear() {
00084     Base::clear();
00085     m_alloc.free();
00086   }
00087 };
00088 
00089 } // namespace Hypertable
00090 
00091 #endif
